desc: Our Certified Organic Japanese Green Tea is sustainably and organically cultivated in Japan.The tea packaging is beautifully designed with Japanese craft Washi paper. Perfect gift for your loved ones

layout.text: Our End Of Financial Year Sale (EOFY) 2022 is on now, with huge deals on ALL products!! This is a best time in a year to grub your favourite tea or try a new green tea for your health!! Warm you up with ELUXELLA Tea!!
